snippet: Harry Thomas Jr. pleaded guilty on Friday to charges that he stole from programs receiving federal money and filed a false tax return.
abstract: Harry Thomas Jr pleads guilty to charges that he stole from programs receiving federal money and filed a false tax return, after resigning from the Council of the District of Columbia.
lead_paragraph: Harry Thomas Jr. pleaded guilty on Friday to charges that he stole from programs receiving federal money and filed a false tax return.

headline.main: Council Member Resigns and Pleads Guilty
headline.print_headline: District Council Member Resigns and Pleads Guilty
